itemDisplayName: Create an Azure Cosmos account for MongoDB API autoscale
description: This template creates an Azure Cosmos DB account for MongoDB API (3.2 or 3.6) in two regions using shared autoscale database throughput with two collections.
summary: This template creates an Azure Cosmos DB account for MongoDB API (3.2 or 3.6) in two regions using shared autoscale database throughput with two collections.
